Planeta

Landing page
about the project

Planeta looks to combat stress and problems at work, the website looks to introduce viewers to their tools. Throughout we give insightful information on their pains and how we look to solve them.

Industry: self-improvement

Tech Stack: Project management, Back-end development, Ux/ui Designer, Front-end development, QA, DevOps

Mobile version

As you would expect, our mobile adjustments make sure to present the important information first. The layout stays clean and still sends viewers through the funnel smoothly like the main website.

How it works

Strengthening owners and managers through increased vitality

Typography & colors
Sky blue Dodger Blue Ivory
Result

With our design we expect viewers to find the information and answers Planeta provides while further enticing them to learn more. The funnel should lead the viewer to be interested in the services Planeta provides and get them in contact. And the implemented test tackles both of those goals.
